FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Find answers to common questions about NextjsLand documentation template.

questions.question: What makes NextjsLand different from other documentation templates?
questions.answer: NextjsLand is built with modern technologies like Next.js 15, Fumadocs, and Tailwind CSS. It features built-in internationalization, dark mode support, responsive design, and SEO optimization out of the box.

questions.question: Can I use NextjsLand for commercial projects?
questions.answer: Yes, NextjsLand is open source and can be used for both personal and commercial projects. You can customize it according to your needs and deploy it anywhere.

questions.question: How do I add new languages to my documentation?
questions.answer: NextjsLand supports internationalization through next-intl. Simply add your language files in the locales folder and update the routing configuration to support your new language.

questions.question: What deployment options are available?
questions.answer: You can deploy NextjsLand on any platform that supports Next.js, including Vercel, Netlify, AWS, or your own server. The template is optimized for static generation and server-side rendering.

FAQ.support: We're here to help! Contact our support team for personalized assistance.

Testimonial.title: What Our Users Say
Testimonial.description: Hear from developers and teams who have transformed their documentation workflow with NextjsLand.

testimonials.name: Alex Chen
testimonials.title: Frontend Developer
testimonials.message: NextjsLand helped me build a professional documentation site in minutes! The multi-language support and dark mode are fantastic. Highly recommend to all developers.

testimonials.name: Sarah Wilson
testimonials.title: Product Manager
testimonials.message: As a non-technical person, I can easily use NextjsLand to create and maintain documentation. Clean interface, powerful features, team collaboration has become more efficient.

testimonials.name: David Wang
testimonials.title: Technical Director
testimonials.message: Our team used NextjsLand to refactor the entire documentation system. Performance improvement is obvious, SEO effect is also very good. This is a trustworthy solution.

testimonials.name: Emma Liu
testimonials.title: UI/UX Designer
testimonials.message: Modern and clean design style, responsive layout perfectly adapts to various devices. Custom theme feature allows our brand image to be well represented.

testimonials.name: Michael Zhang
testimonials.title: Full Stack Developer
testimonials.message: The Next.js-based architecture makes deployment very simple. Vercel one-click deployment is really convenient. The documentation writing experience is also smooth.
